Contact Us

Recurring revenue is the best kind of revenue

Turn Key Payments Solutions With Recurring Revenue Built in.
Better For Resellers, Better For Merchants. The Future Of Payments Is Here.

Multiply Your Sales

Recurring revenues are the best kind of revenues. Especially when you can add revenue streams AND reduce churn. Sell hardware plus integrated POS software, remote support services, P2PE encryption, and payments. Leverage your salesforce and earn more - much more.

We Play Well With Others

The Handpoint payments platform is integrated to a number of industry leading POS systems out of the box to meet the needs of your merchants. And we are certified with processors on three continents. Have something specific in mind? We’re always looking for new ways to extend our already flexible platform.

Deliver What Your Merchants Need

Merchants don’t want to buy card readers and go through lengthy EMV certifications. They want P2PE + semi-integrated solutions, ready to deploy quickly, with effortless updates, and with the payments workflow that fits their needs. Our platform is your go-to-market.

One Terminal Management System To Rule Them All

We make working together incredibly easy through our powerful and flexible TMS, or Terminal Management System, that gives you a high degree of control over your Handpoint experience. Manage your partners, board merchants quickly and easily, perform remote key injections, and push remote updates. Never before has a payments platform been so easy to get so much out of.

The Easiest Merchant On-Boarding In The Industry

With Handpoint’s Terminal Management System it’s a snap to on-board new merchants quickly and easily. Do it yourself with a simple online tool that gets merchants started right away.

We Love Our Partners

You deserve world class customer support, and Handpoint delivers. From first contact to support through the reselling process and beyond Handpoint is committed to your success. Don’t believe us? Put us to the test. Reach out right away and we’ll be happy to help with anything you need.

Let’s talk!

Our solution consultant will get back to you soon
